abstract: Lawyer Wendy E Long receives nomination from New York Republicans to challenge Sen Chuck Schumer, a Democrat, who is running for his fourth term in United States Senate in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Long, a New York City lawyer, was soundly defeated by another incumbent senator, Kirsten E. Gillibrand, in 2012.

headline.main: Republicans Pick Wendy Long to Challenge Chuck Schumer in Senate Race

snippet: Ms. Long, a New York City lawyer, was soundly defeated by another incumbent senator, Kirsten E. Gillibrand, in 2012.
